definitions: A male member of a college fraternity, especially one who embodies the stereotypical behaviors associated with fraternities, such as partying, excessive drinking, and a boisterous attitude.
A young man who is perceived to be immature or irresponsible, often associated with a privileged background.
examples: He was a typical frat boy, always at parties.
The movie depicted the antics of a group of frat boys.
She found his frat boy humor tiresome.
